name: Client Portal : SuiteDash Direct Login
author: SuiteDash :: ONE Dashboard®

sections.description:
SuiteDash : All-in-One Business Software

Visit Website >> SuiteDash.com is the home of SuiteDash, an all-in-one SaaS tool for all of your Client Portal, CRM, Sales Funnel, Appointment Scheduling, Proposals, File Sharing, Project Management, Invoicing, eSigning, LMS, Email Marketing needs.

IMPORTANT :: What is the SuiteDash WordPress Plugin?

This plugin allows you to add a customized login functionality directly on your WordPress site, and have that login tied-in to your SuiteDash account. This allows you, your staff, and your clients to login to your SuiteDash environment directly from your site, without ever needing to visit the SuiteDash login page.

SuiteDash customers with a Custom URL set up are able to integrate their custom URLs with this plugin!

SuiteDash is in constant development, and is updated daily with new features and streamlining. It is also fully supported, and your suggestions are welcome.

See a full list of SuiteDash features at SuiteDash.com
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the SuiteDash WordPress plugin and get it working.

  • Upload the newest version using ‘Add new’ Plugin (WordPress -> Plugins -> Add New), Upload via zip, Upload, and then Activate – OR – Unzip the files on your local machine and upload via FTP to the /plugins/ directory.. then activate from the plugins list.
sections.faq:
How do I get a SuiteDash account?

You can sign up for a risk-free 14-Day Free Trial of SuiteDash : No credit card required : Sign up HERE
sections.changelog:
Version 1.0.9

  • Stable Starter version

Versions 1.1.0 to 1.2.5

  • Small UI changes and compatibility with older versions of PHP

Version 1.2.6

  • Small CSS changes

Version 1.3.0

  • Fixed problem with some chars in email and password;

Version 1.6.1

  • Fixed problem with add shortcode via Gutenberg shortcode widget;

Version 1.7.3

  • Small style changes;

Version 1.7.5

  • Security fixes;

Version 1.7.6

  • Changed font-family to default

Version 1.8.0

  • Security fixes;
sections.reviews:
Good update and fixes

By vonone on April 2, 2024

Version 1.8.0 fixes the security issue.

Thank you for addressing it when ticketed!

Great product look forward to building with it.

Dazzling

By rosiqt on February 21, 2024

Truly spectacular. I am just ecstatic to see how many things this amazing, customizable, platform, can do. I needed a customer portal and could not find a solution that 1)was not from a random freelancer and 2) would cost me an arm and a leg.

Then I came across SuiteDash, and oh boy, was it LOVE as FIRST site!

SuiteDash: A Five-Star Solution for Business Management

By clementdaniel89 on February 12, 2024

SuiteDash has completely transformed the way we run our business. Its user-friendly interface and comprehensive features have streamlined our operations like never before. We particularly appreciate the ability to customize dashboards and workflows to fit our specific needs. Plus, the customer support team is always responsive and helpful whenever we have questions or need assistance. With SuiteDash, we can confidently manage projects, communicate with clients, and handle invoicing, all in one secure platform. I highly recommend SuiteDash to any business looking to enhance efficiency and productivity.

Pros: User-friendly interface, comprehensive features, customizable dashboards, responsive customer support, top-notch security.

Cons: None. SuiteDash exceeds expectations and meets all our business needs effortlessly.

Suite Dash has saved me thousands

By nizzow on February 2, 2024


SuiteDash has been a game-changer in streamlining my professional life for over a year, and I regret not discovering it earlier. This all-in-one platform has allowed me to consolidate multiple tools, including MailChimp, JotForms, and Slack, into one seamless interface, significantly reducing the clutter of managing separate subscriptions. The ease and efficiency it brings to my daily operations are unparalleled.

Not only has SuiteDash simplified my workflow, but it has also elevated my professional demeanor. Everything I need is now accessible within one application, enabling me to execute tasks more swiftly and effectively. This improved efficiency has been a tremendous asset in managing my time and resources.

Moreover, SuiteDash excels in customer support and user training. The array of supportive resources, particularly the easy-to-follow training videos, is nothing short of impressive. They provide an in-depth understanding of how to maximize the software's potential, making the experience not just user-friendly, but also enjoyable.

The Game-Changer in Business Management & Automation

By gulbis on February 1, 2024

I've been around the block with business tools for 20+ years, and let me tell you, SuiteDash is… Different!

It’s so powerful, so flexible, and so customizable, that it might take some time to get your head around it and to stop day-dreaming about all the unlimited possibilities. But once you “get” it - the systems thinking and automations, there’s no going back.

SuiteDash is the Swiss Army knife for business - handling everything from CRM to project management, and all the nitty-gritty in between.

What really blows me away is its automation game. If it can be automated, SuiteDash has got it covered. Think lead gen, onboarding, you name it – this platform turns these into a breeze.

Customization is top-notch. Whether it's tweaking the look or translating the whole platform, SuiteDash lets you make it yours (this comes with a warning: "Stay focused"). The Template Library is a goldmine, perfect for sprucing up your business docs without sweating over them.

Client portals is a gem. It’s not just a static page with a few links. Anything can by dynamically set up based on customer segment, workflow stages, steps, etc. This helps keep clients in the loop and make collaborations easy and automated.

Long story short: SuiteDash isn’t just a tool, it’s a game-changer. It streamlines, automates, and transforms your business processes. Hop on the SuiteDash train, and you won’t look back. Trust me, it’s the business upgrade you’ve been waiting for!

SuiteDash!!

By tiffperkins84 on January 30, 2024

SuiteDash is a great tool. It has been extremely helpful with integrations and automations. It has saved me so much time in getting my clients and staff system up in my portal.

Suitedash

By sttaxbus on January 29, 2024

I have started using Suitedash for my tax business and it has helped me with managing my business more effectively and efficiently with my team. It has eliminated some of the programs (client portal, calendar, etc.) that I have been using, saving me money. I will utilize Suitedash with my real estate business as well. Thank you Suitedash.

Love the way you can white label your own CRM/Portal - Def. one of the best apps

By pjcams on January 29, 2024

I've been using SuiteDash off and on for different business projects for several years and it remains my go-to for anything client portal related, CRM related and project management.

The direct login plugin allows me to easily place the login option on an existing site and seamlessly drops the client into the portal without having to leave the wordpress site.

It's nice to find an application / CRM / PM system that is evolving and improving and not abandoned like so many others.

Suitedash an all rounder.

By Muthukumaran V on January 23, 2024

The automation features have significantly streamlined our processes, saving time and increasing efficiency. Overall, the Suitedash program has exceeded our expectations, enhancing our customer relationships and contributing to our business growth.

Revolutionize Your Business with SuiteDash: The Ultimate CRM for EVERYTHING

By level7llc on January 22, 2024

In the fast-paced world of small business management, finding the right tools to streamline operations and maximize efficiency is crucial. SuiteDash emerges as a game-changer in this arena, especially for those focused on marketing and process automation.

From the moment you start using SuiteDash, the benefits for small businesses are abundantly clear. It's not just a Customer Relationship Management (CRM) tool; it's a comprehensive platform that integrates all aspects of your business, from client interactions to workflow automation. This integration is a major boon, as it eliminates the need for multiple software solutions, thereby reducing costs and simplifying processes.

One of the most impressive features of SuiteDash is its marketing prowess. The platform offers robust email marketing tools, allowing you to create, send, and track email campaigns with ease. This functionality is a godsend for small businesses looking to engage their audience without investing in separate email marketing services. The customization options ensure that each campaign reflects your brand's unique voice and style, enhancing customer engagement and loyalty.

Another standout aspect is SuiteDash's process automation capabilities. It automates routine tasks, from lead tracking to invoice generation, freeing up valuable time for you to focus on strategic growth. The intuitive interface makes setting up these automations a breeze, even for those who are not tech-savvy. The platform's ability to streamline complex workflows is a testament to its thoughtful design and understanding of small business needs.

The client portal feature of SuiteDash deserves special mention. It offers a secure and personalized space for your clients to interact with your business. This portal enhances client communication and service delivery, making it easier to manage projects, share documents, and gather feedback. This level of client engagement is often reserved for larger enterprises, but SuiteDash brings it within reach of small businesses.

Security and compliance are other areas where SuiteDash shines. In an era where data security is paramount, SuiteDash offers peace of mind with its robust security protocols and compliance with regulations. This focus on security not only protects your business and client data but also builds trust with your customers.

In conclusion, SuiteDash stands out as an exceptional CRM tool for small businesses, particularly for those looking to enhance their marketing efforts and automate processes. Its user-friendly interface, combined with powerful features, makes it an ideal choice for businesses aiming to streamline operations and foster growth. SuiteDash is more than just a CRM; it's a partner in your business journey, empowering you to achieve new heights of success and efficiency.
